description:
Nova uses both python-ipy and python-netaddr modules to maninpulate ip address. This can cause headaches for distro maintainers since they have to support both python modules. 

Regards
chuck
title: Duplicate functionality in python-ipy and python-netaddr

comments.content:
Nova uses both python-ipy and python-netaddr modules to maninpulate ip address. This can cause headaches for distro maintainers since they have to support both python modules. 

Regards
chuck
